mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bargain_help (bargain_id, helper_id, helper_name, cut_amount, created_at) VALUES (#{bargainId}, #{helperId}, #{helperName}, #{cutAmount}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT bh.*, u.avatar_url as helper_avatar FROM bargain_help bh LEFT JOIN users u ON bh.helper_id = u.id WHERE bh.bargain_id = #{bargainId} ORDER BY bh.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bargain_help WHERE bargain_id = #{bargainId}
